ajxpcore.description: Main container for core AjaXplorer settings (application title, sharing, webdav server config, etc...)

global_param.name: DEFAULT_LANGUAGE
global_param.label: Default Language
global_param.description: Default language when a user does not have set his/her own.

global_param.name: PUBLIC_DOWNLOAD_FOLDER
global_param.label: Download Folder
global_param.description: Absolute path to the public folder where temporary download links will be created. Setting this empty will disable the sharing feature.

global_param.name: PUBLIC_DOWNLOAD_URL
global_param.label: Download URL
global_param.description: If not inferred directly from the current ajaxplorer URI plus the public download folder name, replace the public access URL here.

global_param.name: ALLOW_CROSSUSERS_SHARING
global_param.label: Existing users
global_param.description: Allow the users to pick an existing user when sharing a folder

global_param.name: GZIP_COMPRESSION
global_param.label: Gzip Download
global_param.description: Gzip files on-the-fly before downloading. Disabled by default, as it's generally useful only on small files, and decreases performances on big files. This has nothing to see with the Zip Creation feature, it's just a on-the-fly compression applied on a unique file at download.

global_param.name: GZIP_LIMIT
global_param.label: Gzip Limit
global_param.description: If activated, a default limit should be set above when files are no more compressed.

global_param.name: ZIP_CREATION
global_param.label: Zip Creation
global_param.description: If you encounter problems with online zip creation or multiple files downloading, you can disable the feature.

global_param.name: WEBDAV_ENABLE
global_param.label: Enable WebDAV
global_param.description: Enable the webDAV support. Please READ THE DOC to safely use this feature.

global_param.name: WEBDAV_BASEURI
global_param.label: Shares URI
global_param.description: Common URI to access the shares. Please READ THE DOC to safely use this feature.

global_param.name: WEBDAV_BASEHOST
global_param.label: Shares Host
global_param.description: Host used in webDAV protocol. Should be detected by default. Please READ THE DOC to safely use this feature.

global_param.name: WEBDAV_DIGESTREALM
global_param.label: Digest Realm
global_param.description: Default realm for authentication. Please READ THE DOC to safely use this feature.

global_param.name: CMDLINE_ACTIVE
global_param.label: Command-line Active
global_param.description: Use AjaXplorer framework via the command line, allowing CRONTAB jobs or background actions.

global_param.name: CLI_PHP
global_param.label: Command-line PHP
global_param.description: On specific hosts, you may have to use a specific path to access the php command line

global_param.name: NODENAME_MAX_LENGTH
global_param.label: Filename length
global_param.description: Maximum characters length of new files or folders

global_param.name: AJXP_TMP_DIR
global_param.label: Temporary Folder
global_param.description: This is necessary only if you have errors concerning the tmp dir access or writeability : most probably, they are due to PHP SAFE MODE (should disappear in php6) or various OPEN_BASEDIR restrictions. In that case, create and set writeable a tmp folder somewhere at the root of your hosting (but above the web/ or www/ or http/ if possible!!) and enter here the full path to this folder

global_param.name: WEBMASTER_EMAIL
global_param.label: Admin email
global_param.description: Administrator email, not used for the moment
